summary: This is just adding copy of Miraak's mask as a clothing, nothing more.
descriptionHtml:
I felt that something was missing in Dragonborn DLC so i made this little mod to make things right. Bethesda never thought about people who wanted to use Mage Armor perk, but also get advantages of Miraak's mask.

Mask was renamed MiraakFines just to make some difference, if you want to get it , just type  'help miraakfines' in  console, and you'll get mask id and you can add it.
author: KowalskiVader
